nodes.text: The ISS-7 Guardian Battledroid was a battle droid in service of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY it was stationed aboard the Emperor's Glory guarding the tractor beam control console. The Republic boarding party from the Esseles confronted the battle droid and destroyed it.
The ISS-7 guardian battledroid serves as the fourth boss of Flashpoint: the Esseles in Star Wars: The Old Republic. It must be destroyed in order to progress in the flashpoint.
